Action.author: jeffgarratt
Action.body: This functionality is available as long as all of the docker images are built (i.e. kafka, zookeeper, etc.). You simply need to uncomment the example lines for those configs at the bottom of the bootstrap.feature file.

Action.author: rameshthoomu
Action.body: These tests are now moved fabric-test repository. Also, the repo has these tests. Closing this now.
